name: kg-gap-filler
description: A sample Obsidian plugin for gap filling

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p ./test/.obsidian/plugins/kggapfiller && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -rf dist/* ./test/.obsidian/plugins/kggapfiller
scripts.build:bundle: esbuild --external:obsidian src/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/main.js && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && mkdir -p ./test/.obsidian/plugins/kggapfiller && cp -rf dist/* ./test/.obsidian/plugins/kggapfiller
